name: Sherrilyn WASHINGTON, Respondent v. Harry HAMILTON, Petitioner

parties: Sherrilyn WASHINGTON, Respondent v. Harry HAMILTON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of January, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Application for Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
108 A.3d 1276
Sherrilyn WASHINGTON, Respondent v. Harry HAMILTON, Petitioner.
No. 194 MM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 27, 2015.
